sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. In a food processor, blend white fish fillets, red curry paste, finely chopped green beans, finely chopped kaffir lime leaves, fish sauce, and brown sugar until smooth. 2. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and add beaten egg. Mix well. 3. Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. 4. Shape the fish mixture into small patties. 5. Fry fish cakes in batches until golden brown and cooked through. 6. Serve hot with cucumber relish.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>White Fish Fillets (500g), Red Curry Pas</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Thai Fish Cakes</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 10g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Finely chop green beans and kaffir lime leaves.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b491d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
